original_title: My Last Days: Meet Claire, Finding Beauty in the Sadness
overview: Claire Wineland was born with Cystic Fibrosis. Doctors say she has only a short time left to live, but she never lets that stop her from making the most of every day. Her dream? To be a motivational speaker. Hear her story and watch her get an amazing surprise..
title: My Last Days: Meet Claire, Finding Beauty in the Sadness
